com.maverick.sftp
Class ACL

java.lang.Object
  com.maverick.sftp.ACL

public class ACL
extends java.lang.Object

Version 4 of the SFTP protocol introduces an ACL field in the SftpFileAttributes structure.

Author:
Lee David Painter
